meta.name: description
meta.value: Value to use in disambiguation menu when displaying the label with type.

parameter.name: handleLabel
parameter.description: The handle label (i.e., Home, Work, Office, etc.).

parameter.name: handleType
parameter.description: ToDO. Update params with dialog.PersonHandle once we have access to public property Type. The handle type (i.e., phoneNumberHandleType, emailHandleType, etc.).
